017package org.microbean.loader.typesafe.config;
018
019import java.io.BufferedInputStream;
020import java.io.BufferedReader;
021import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
022import java.io.IOException;
023import java.io.InputStream;
024import java.io.InputStreamReader;
025import java.io.Reader;
026import java.io.UncheckedIOException;
027
028import java.lang.reflect.Type;
029
030import java.nio.file.Files;
031import java.nio.file.NoSuchFileException;
032import java.nio.file.Paths;
033
034import java.util.List;
035import java.util.Objects;
036
037import java.util.function.Supplier;
038
039import java.util.stream.Collectors;
040
041import com.typesafe.config.Config;
042import com.typesafe.config.ConfigBeanFactory;
043import com.typesafe.config.ConfigException;
044import com.typesafe.config.ConfigFactory;
045import com.typesafe.config.ConfigObject;
046import com.typesafe.config.ConfigParseOptions;
047import com.typesafe.config.ConfigResolveOptions;
048import com.typesafe.config.ConfigResolver;
049import com.typesafe.config.ConfigSyntax;
050import com.typesafe.config.ConfigUtil;
051import com.typesafe.config.ConfigValue;
052import com.typesafe.config.ConfigValueFactory;
053
054import org.microbean.invoke.CachingSupplier;
055import org.microbean.invoke.FixedValueSupplier;
056
057import org.microbean.loader.api.Loader;
058
059import org.microbean.loader.spi.AbstractProvider;
060import org.microbean.loader.spi.Value;
061
062import org.microbean.path.Path;
063import org.microbean.path.Path.Element;
064
065import org.microbean.qualifier.Qualifiers;
066
067import org.microbean.type.JavaTypes;
068
069import org.microbean.type.Type.CovariantSemantics;
070
071/**
072 * An {@link AbstractProvider} that uses a {@link Config} to
073 * {@linkplain #get(Loader, Path) produce} {@link Value}s.
074 *
075 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
076 * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
077 *
078 * @see #get(Loader, Path)
079 */
080public class TypesafeConfigHoconProvider extends AbstractProvider {
081
082
083  /*
084   * Instance fields.
085   */
086
087
088  private final Supplier<? extends Config> configSupplier;
089
090
091  /*
092   * Constructors.
093   */
094
095
096  /**
097   * Creates a new {@link TypesafeConfigHoconProvider} that reads
098   * solely from a classpath resource named {@code application.conf},
099   * using the {@link Thread#getContextClassLoader() context
100   * classloader}.
101   *
102   * <p>No stacking of other configurations is performed.</p>
103   *
104   * @see #TypesafeConfigHoconProvider(ClassLoader, String)
105   */
106  public TypesafeConfigHoconProvider() {
107    this(null, Thread.currentThread().getContextClassLoader(), "application.conf");
108  }
109
110  /**
111   * Creates a new {@link TypesafeConfigHoconProvider} that reads
112   * solely from a classpath resource bearing the supplied name using
113   * the {@linkplain Thread#getContextClassLoader() context
114   * classloader}.
115   *
116   * <p>No stacking of other configurations is performed.</p>
117   *
118   * @param resourceName the name of the classpath resource; must not
119   * be {@code null}
120   *
121   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code resourceName} is {@code
122   * null}
123   *
124   * @see #TypesafeConfigHoconProvider(ClassLoader, String)
125   */
126  public TypesafeConfigHoconProvider(final String resourceName) {
127    this(null, Thread.currentThread().getContextClassLoader(), resourceName);
128  }
129
130  /**
131   * Creates a new {@link TypesafeConfigHoconProvider} that reads
132   * solely from a classpath resource bearing the supplied name using
133   * the supplied {@link ClassLoader}.
134   *
135   * <p>No stacking of other configurations is performed.</p>
136   *
137   * @param cl the {@link ClassLoader}; may be {@code null} in which
138   * case the system classloader will be used instead, normally via
139   * {@link ClassLoader#getSystemResourceAsStream(String)}
140   *
141   * @param resourceName the name of the classpath resource; must not
142   * be {@code null}
143   *
144   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code resourceName} is {@code
145   * null}
146   */
147  public TypesafeConfigHoconProvider(final ClassLoader cl, final String resourceName) {
148    this(null, cl, resourceName);
149  }
150
151  /**
152   * Creates a new {@link TypesafeConfigHoconProvider} that reads
153   * solely from a classpath resource bearing the supplied name using
154   * the supplied {@link ClassLoader}.
155   *
156   * <p>No stacking of other configurations is performed.</p>
157   *
158   * @param lowerBound the {@linkplain #lowerBound() lower type bound}
159   * of this {@link TypesafeConfigHoconProvider} implementation; may
160   * be {@code null}
161   *
162   * @param cl the {@link ClassLoader}; may be {@code null} in which
163   * case the system classloader will be used instead, normally via
164   * {@link ClassLoader#getSystemResourceAsStream(String)}
165   *
166   * @param resourceName the name of the classpath resource; must not
167   * be {@code null}
168   *
169   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code resourceName} is {@code
170   * null}
171   */
172  public TypesafeConfigHoconProvider(final Type lowerBound, final ClassLoader cl, final String resourceName) {
173    super(lowerBound);
174    Objects.requireNonNull(resourceName, "resourceName");
175    this.configSupplier = new CachingSupplier<>(() -> produceConfig(cl, resourceName));    
176  }
177
178
179  /*
180   * Instance methods.
181   */
182
183
184  @Override // AbstractProvider<Object>
185  public final Value<?> get(final Loader<?> requestor, final Path<? extends Type> absolutePath) {
186    final Value<?> returnValue;
187    // TODO: doesn't handle qualifiers yet
188    final String configPath = configPath(absolutePath);
189    final Config config = this.config();
190    if (configPath.isEmpty()) {
191      Value<?> temp = null;
192      try {
193        temp = new Value<>(ConfigBeanFactory.create(config, JavaTypes.erase(absolutePath.qualified())), absolutePath);
194      } catch (final ConfigException.BadBean | ConfigException.ValidationFailed e) {
195        final Object unwrapped = config.root().unwrapped();
196        final Class<?> unwrappedClass = unwrapped.getClass();
197        if (CovariantSemantics.INSTANCE.assignable(absolutePath.qualified(), unwrappedClass)) {
198          temp = new Value<>(unwrappedClass.cast(unwrapped), absolutePath);
199        }
200      } finally {
201        returnValue = temp;
202      }
203    } else if (config.hasPathOrNull(configPath)) {
204      final ConfigValue configValue;
205      if (config.getIsNull(configPath)) {
206        configValue = ConfigValueFactory.fromAnyRef(null);
207      } else {
208        configValue = config.getValue(configPath);
209      }
210      final Object unwrapped = configValue.unwrapped();
211      final Class<?> unwrappedClass = unwrapped.getClass();
212      switch (configValue.valueType()) {
213      case BOOLEAN:
214      case LIST:
215      case NUMBER:
216      case STRING:
217        if (CovariantSemantics.INSTANCE.assignable(absolutePath.qualified(), unwrappedClass)) {
218          returnValue = new Value<>(unwrappedClass.cast(unwrapped), absolutePath);
219        } else {
220          returnValue = null;
221        }
222        break;
223      case NULL:
224        returnValue = new Value<>(absolutePath);
225        break;
226      case OBJECT:
227        Value<?> temp = null;
228        try {
229          temp =
230            new Value<>(ConfigBeanFactory.create(((ConfigObject)configValue).toConfig(),
231                                                 JavaTypes.erase(absolutePath.qualified())),
232                        absolutePath);
233        } catch (final ConfigException.BadBean | ConfigException.ValidationFailed e) {
234          if (CovariantSemantics.INSTANCE.assignable(absolutePath.qualified(), unwrappedClass)) {
235            temp = new Value<>(unwrappedClass.cast(unwrapped), absolutePath);
236          }
237        } finally {
238          returnValue = temp;
239        }
240        break;
241      default:
242        throw new AssertionError();
243      }
244    } else {
245      returnValue = null;
246    }
247    return returnValue;
248  }
249
250  private final Config config() {
251    return this.configSupplier.get();
252  }
253
254
255  /*
256   * Static methods.
257   */
258
259
260  private static final String configPath(final Path<?> path) {
261    return path.stream()
262      .map(Element::name)
263      .reduce(ConfigUtil::joinPath)
264      .orElse(null);
265  }
266
267  private static final Config produceConfig(final ClassLoader cl, final String resourceName) {
268    final InputStream inputStream =
269      cl == null ? ClassLoader.getSystemResourceAsStream(resourceName) : cl.getResourceAsStream(resourceName);
270    Reader reader;
271    if (inputStream == null) {
272      try {
273        reader = Files.newBufferedReader(Paths.get(System.getProperty("user.dir", "."), resourceName));
274      } catch (final FileNotFoundException /* this probably isn't thrown */ | NoSuchFileException e) {
275        return ConfigFactory.empty();
276      } catch (final IOException ioException) {
277        throw new UncheckedIOException(ioException.getMessage(), ioException);
278      }
279    } else if (inputStream instanceof BufferedInputStream) {
280      reader = new InputStreamReader(inputStream);
281    } else {
282      reader = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(inputStream));
283    }
284    return ConfigFactory.parseReader(reader,
285                                     ConfigParseOptions.defaults().setSyntaxFromFilename(resourceName))
286      .resolve(ConfigResolveOptions.noSystem().appendResolver(new Resolver()));
287  }
288
289
290  /*
291   * Inner and nested classes.
292   */
293
294
295  private static final class Resolver implements ConfigResolver {
296
297    private final ConfigResolver fallback;
298
299    private Resolver() {
300      this(null);
301    }
302
303    private Resolver(final ConfigResolver fallback) {
304      super();
305      this.fallback = fallback;
306    }
307
308    @Override // ConfigResolver
309    public final ConfigValue lookup(final String path) {
310      // Called only for substitutions that are not internal to the Config.
311      return
312        ConfigValueFactory.fromAnyRef(Loader.loader()
313                                      .load(Path.of(Object.class, ConfigUtil.splitPath(path)))
314                                      .orElseGet(() -> this.fallback == null ? null : this.fallback.lookup(path)));
315    }
316
317    @Override // ConfigResolver
318    public final ConfigResolver withFallback(final ConfigResolver fallback) {
319      if (fallback == null || fallback.equals(this.fallback)) {
320        return this;
321      }
322      return new Resolver(fallback);
323    }
324
325  }
326
327}
